answers.answer: Welcome back and congratulations on reaching your "almost" half way mark.  Keep up the good work and continue focusing on that "healthy bun" (I like that expression).  Come back and see us whenever you like.  We always enjoy having you around.
Great to see you Joy!! So glad you are well and the baby is growing!! Are you finding out the sex? I totally forgot now i think you said you were!!

Hi Joy!  So good to "hear" you.  I "see" you around every once in a while, so I knew that you any "our" little grand baby were progressing nicely.I'm so thankful that you are doing well.  Thanks for the update.

gokuangel- yes we will be finding out! Hopefully the last week in May or the first week in June. Appt this Friday we'll probably set up The Ultrasound!Barb and twehner- hope you two are doing well, too!

question: Missing you guys! Just referred someone over here and got me thinking I should drop by and say hello. I'm almost 16 weeks pregnant now (almost halfway there--- almost!). I am weighing in at 187 lbs so I've gained 10 lbs so far. Not the most fun part but I'm trying to not focus on the weight issues; focusing on baking a healthy bun. Obviously I don't want to gain too much, too fast, because then I put myself at risk for gestational diabetes and pre eclampsia and all those ugly things.So just missing you all! I hope everyone is doing well and is losing/maintaining weight!
title: Missing you guys!
